org.jcatapult.security.servlet
Class JCatapultSecurityContextProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.security.servlet.JCatapultSecurityContextProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnhancedSecurityContextProvider, org.jcatapult.security.spi.SecurityContextProvider
public class JCatapultSecurityContextProvider
extends Object
implements EnhancedSecurityContextProvider

This class implements the SecurityContextProvider using the JCatapult security framework. Mainly, this uses the implementations of the UserAdapter and CredentialStorage interfaces in order to fulfill the methods. Since the CredentialStorage is an HTTP servlet specific interface, this uses the ServletObjectsHolder thread local storage that is used in the JCatapultFilter in order to get access to the HTTP classes that are required. This is somewhat of a hack, but it is very difficult
